ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T13:55:40 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 12:22:45. [Issue ID 45550]
ComicInfo.Title: How Sharper than a Serpent's Tooth; How the Silver Surfer's Powers Work!!; Cosmic Awareness Comparisons; An Informal Tour of the Universe; Buried Treasure; Shooting Star; The Saga of the Serpent Crown [Part 1]: Creation
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ghaur battles the Silver Surfer while telling him his origin story. He then travels to Earth, meets up with Llyra, and plots to gain the power of the Serpent Crown.
Reed explains the nature of the universe to his son.
ComicInfo.StoryArc: Atlantis Attacks,Saga of the Serpent Crown
